data.message: What happened to the SHARE option..Almost ALL my friends and family Post NO longer have the OPTION to SHARE their POST. WHY? Not being able to SHARE other people POST has taken the FUN out of FACEBOOK.

replies.message: Hi Linda. Facebook has policies in place to stop behavior that other people may find annoying or abusive. We've determined that you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. This could include sharing to too many places, too quickly. If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2yLJDAq. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2z6m0Dn. -Tenaya
